DOC.brief_summary: A study to assess safety and PK of an investigational drug in migraine patients during and between migraine attacks.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of Gastric Delay in Migraine Patients (3207-003)
DOC.criteria: Nonsmoking male or female between 18 to 45 years of age Patient typically has between 2 and 10 migraine attacks per month, rated as moderate or severe Patient has any other medical conditions other than migraine
